follow_result.message: #FollowTheResult is a civic-tech platform that promotes electoral integrity by enabling citizens to monitor and report election results in real time.

shecanserve.message: SheCanServe empowers over 1 million African Millennial and Gen-Z women with governance skills, leadership training, and mentorship opportunities.

eip_dpap.message: EIP-DPAP (Electoral Integrity Protection and Democratic Participation & Accountability Project) aims to protect results and empower non-violent democratic participation.

readytovote.message: ReadyToVote Abia educates citizens about voting rights and combines voter awareness with free medical outreach in Abia State.

nypd.message: The National Youth Peace Dialogue (NYPD) engages youth in peacebuilding and conflict resolution through events and workshops.
